name: Cursed House 9 - Match 3 Puzzle
description:
In the latest Cursed House adventure, gather up your courage and press on to the haunted mansion on the hill and rid it of evil spirits. The residence, once magnificent, has long since fallen to the domain of malevolence. The spirits that reside there care for nothing but the power of the Amulet. Gather the mysterious coins scattered around the mansion to recharge the amulet and use its power to banish the spirits once and for all!

120 new match 3 levels!
New game mechanics!
New bonus game!
Solitaire, Find the Difference and Hidden Object
